column1: Smoque BBQ////My fianc√© loves this place! He loves meat and BBQ so it's a perfect match for him. Obviously
column2: it is a smokehouse....being a pescatarian I had a difficult time picking foods for my diet. I was hopeful the restaurant would have at least 2 salads...nope. They had only one and it was nothing special. Maybe in the future they will create more salads?! Once again
column3: great place for BBQ lovers but limited options for specialty diets.
